attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think that the Prime minister and Her I think that the Prime minister and Her Majesties Government should do away with the uneducated, talentless, self gratifying moron that is Russell Brand.

He is a public embarrassment and he looks a little too much like Amy Winehouse to be trusted.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
